text: Ara ibrahimera tamra pitara jan'ye ksama prarthana kara sudhu ejan'ya chara an'ya karane naya ye ekati angikara ya tini ora sanbandhe oyada karechilena. Kintu yakhana eti tamra kache pariskara kara haâ€™la ye se nihsandeha allahâ€Œra ekajana satru takhana tini ora theke nirlipta haye gelena. Nihsandeha ibrahima chilena komala hrdayera, sahanasila.
